## brms

```{r eval = params$fit_all}
library(brms)
Amat <- as.matrix(nadiv::makeA(gryphonped))
brms_m1.1 <- brm(
  bwt ~ 1 + (1 | gr(animal, cov = Amat)),
  data = gryphon,
  data2 = list(Amat = Amat),
  family = gaussian(),
  chains = 2, cores = 2, iter = 1000
)
save(brms_m1.1, file = "data/brms_m1_1.rda")
```

```{r}
load("data/brms_m1_1.rda")
summary(brms_m1.1)
plot(brms_m1.1)
```
